actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A resolution designating February 2006 as "Go Direct Month".
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Declares that the Senate: (1) supports the goals and ideas of "Go Direct"; (2) proclaims February 2006 as "Go Direct Month"; and (3) commends federal, state, and local governments, and the private sector, for promoting February as "Go Direct Month." Encourages all citizens of the United States to: (1) participate in events and awareness initiatives held during the month of February; (2) become informed about the convenience and safety of direct deposit; and (3) consider signing up for direct deposit of Social Security or other federal benefits.

titles.title: A resolution designating February 2006 as "Go Direct Month".
